text:
I just remembered something I needed to buy.
I think I left it somewhere the other day.

If you'd like...
Rinze, would you like to come along too...?

But since I'm with Rinze now,
I want to spend enjoyable time together.

Shopping with Natsuha-san...
Rinze also... enjoys...

Really? Then... would you like to stop by a store for a bit?
It's not for hats though.

There's a brand I wanted to try on Rinze.
This way...!
